privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At ExploraPeru, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionDescription: We collect personal data such as your name, email and phone number when you create an account or book a tour. We also collect information automatically, such as your IP address and browsing preferences.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsDescription: You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data at any time. You can contact us to make these requests.
privacyPolicy.securityDescription: We take security measures to protect your information, including the use of technologies such as SSL to secure data transmission.
privacyPolicy.contactUsDescription: If you have questions about this privacy policy, feel free to contact us through our social networks.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.aboutUsDescription: We are ExploraPer√∫, a platform that allows certified tourism agencies to offer their tours, and users to book them. We act as intermediaries between the agencies and travelers.
termsAndConditions.scopeDescription: These terms and conditions apply to all users of ExploraPer√∫. By using our platform, you agree to abide by these terms.
termsAndConditions.servicesDescription: ExploraPer√∫ does not organize tours. The services are provided by independent certified agencies.
termsAndConditions.paymentsDescription: Prices include applicable taxes. Payments are processed securely through our platform.
termsAndConditions.cancellationsDescription: Cancellations and changes are subject to the policies of the agency offering the tour.
termsAndConditions.privacyDescription: We respect your privacy and handle your data in accordance with our Policy of
termsAndConditions.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us via social media or email.

toursRecomendados.title: MACHU PICCHU
toursRecomendados.longDescription: Discover the majestic Historic Sanctuary of Machu Picchu, one of the Seven Wonders of the Modern World, and a true archaeological gem of Peru. This tour takes you through the enigmatic remains of the Inca civilization, surrounded by towering mountains and lush jungle vegetation.

toursRecomendados.title: LAKE TITICACA
toursRecomendados.shortDescription: Highest navigable lake in the world, located in Puno
toursRecomendados.longDescription: Immerse yourself in the magic of Lake Titicaca, the highest navigable lake in the world, situated at 3,812 meters above sea level. This breathtaking body of water, steeped in history and traditions, is home to ancient communities that preserve their vibrant culture.

toursRecomendados.title: LIMA
toursRecomendados.longDescription: Explore the vibrant city of Lima, known as the "City of Kings," where history, culture, and one of the world‚Äôs best cuisines come together. This tour will take you through its fascinating colonial streets, modern avenues, and stunning Pacific coastline.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: We Are the Best
aboutUs.paragraph1: Our tours offer a wide range of destinations to suit a variety of interests. From sunny beaches with golden sands and crystal-clear oceans, to stunning mountainous landscapes, tranquil lakes, and lush forests, we have it all covered.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Don't miss the opportunity! We have an enticing offer: the first 50 people to register for the tour will receive a 15% discount on purchases with our partners:

list.title: Selected Destinations
list.description: We curate the best travel experiences, offering only the most beautiful and unique destinations worldwide.

list.title: Personalized Itineraries
list.description: No two travelers are the same, and their adventures shouldn't be either.

list.title: Exceptional Customer Support
list.description: From the moment you book to the time you return home, our dedicated customer support team is available 24/7.

reasons.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
reasons.description: Explore the history, art, and architecture of some of the world's oldest and most fascinating civilizations, from ancient temples in Cambodia to the majestic Taj Mahal in India.

reasons.title: Natural Beauty
reasons.description: Discover some of the world's most stunning natural landscapes, including the towering Himalayas and the lush rainforests of Southeast Asia.

reasons.title: Incredible Cuisine
reasons.description: Delight in the wide array of delicious cuisines and flavors that Asia has to offer, from Thailand's spicy curries to Japan's delicate sushi.

reasons.title: Warm Hospitality
reasons.description: Experience the kindness and generosity of the people, known for their warm and welcoming hospitality, and create unforgettable memories along the way.

reasons.title: Vibrant Cities
reasons.description: Feel the excitement of some of the world's most dynamic and vibrant cities, such as Tokyo and Bangkok, with a mix of modern and traditional architecture, vibrant nightlife, and countless cultural attractions.

reviews.name: Sarah Morgan
reviews.text: Choose from an extensive selection of blends and single origins, each crafted to deliver a unique experience.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.text: The tour was absolutely amazing. The guides were knowledgeable, and the scenery was breathtaking.

reviews.name: Emma Wilson
reviews.text: I had the time of my life on this adventure. The experiences were unforgettable, and I made great friends.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.text: The attention to detail in planning the trip was impressive. Every day was a new and exciting experience.

reviews.name: Lisa Chen
reviews.text: From the moment I booked until the end of the trip, the service was impeccable. Highly recommended!
